subject: Re: Error Messages when paying
preview: Hi Dan and Jasmine,We have updated the validation message at the top of the form. Please see the attached.

full_threads.body:
Hi Dan and Jasmine,

We have updated the validation message at the top of the form. Please see the attached.

Thanks Heath. That makes sense. I wouldn't react negatively to it. Other than jasmine's suggestion on wording tweak, not sure what else we could do in this particular area.

Cheers

D

Dan Gerber

Managing Director

Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:



M 0412 955 531 | P 02 9310 1611

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi Heath,

Maybe it needs a please contact the office on 9310 1611 for assistance?

Most of the time it is insufficent funds or credit card limit. We get a lot of calls wondering why payment won't go through. When they call through saying they are trying to put the credit card in but it keeps coming up with an error message Sophie or I can quickly jump into stripe and checkout the error message and notify the vendor.

Kind Regards,

Jasmine Killey

Assistant to Senior Stylist

Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:



P 02 9310 1611

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

PO Box 7125, ALEXANDRIA NSW 2015

http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

[url=advantagepropertystyling.com.au]

Perfect thanks Jasmine.

This type of information from the vendor is always valuable to us when getting to the bottom of any issues and can expedite things at our end.

Dan, this is tricky… as you can see we have clearly said twice to the client the card was declined, and they have still had this particular reaction. This side of things has been running for months and it's the first response of this sort we have received. I would put it down to this particular user. For example there have been 12 other individuals have the same failed payment message across the last 30 days and it appears they understood the process. Additionally, we try not to change these messages as they are pushed directly from Stripe (who often have API changes etc.). I hope this makes sense, but if you want us to pursue a different route, then feel free to let me know.

Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au

Thanks Jas. So yep, we can't do much about that as the client needs to know if their card is not working.

Heath any suggested edits to the platform for the 'rejections' so it isn't too alarmist for them? Tweak the messaging perhaps?

Dan

Dan Gerber

Managing Director

Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:



M 0412 955 531 | P 02 9310 1611

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi Dan and Heath,

I just checked with the venodr, yes the error message was coming up.

Thank you for looking into it for me Heath.

Kind Regards,

Jasmine Killey

Assistant to Senior Stylist

Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:



P 02 9310 1611

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

PO Box 7125, ALEXANDRIA NSW 2015

http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

[url=advantagepropertystyling.com.au]

Thanks Heath. I'm not sure why they thought they had paid 3 times.

Perhaps Jasmine can provide some further information on what they saw at their end to get this impression?

Dan

Dan Gerber

Managing Director

Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:



M 0412 955 531 | P 02 9310 1611

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi Dan, 

Yes that's correct, the client would have received 2 areas where the form turns red and explains that the card has been declined. She has not been charged three times. 

The error received for this particular client (as seen in Stripe) is 'Do not honour'. This a generic response from the processor when something is not 'right' at the credit card banks end. 

Hope this helps?

Ok but obviously the vendor is seeing some message if they thought we had charged their card 3 times.

If you speak with them again, can you please ask them what they received when it declined (email, on-screen??). I think this would help the Wolf IQ folks to identify the problem.

Cheers

Dan

Dan Gerber

Managing Director

Advantage Property Styling

http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

This is in stripe and only Sophie and I see this. I'm just not sure on the vendors end what error message they see?

Kind Regards,

Just checking an error message is coming up when a vendors credit card declines?


I had a vendor call in a panic we had charged her card 3 times yesterday (see below)
